mapper.select: SELECT ur.id id, ur.create_time createTime, ur.`name` `name`, ur.url url, ur.description description, ur.category_id categoryId FROM stock_user_role_rel ar LEFT JOIN stock_role r ON ar.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN stock_role_resource_rel rrr ON r.id = rrr.role_id LEFT JOIN stock_resource ur ON ur.id = rrr.resource_id WHERE ar.user_id = #{userId} AND ur.id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY ur.id
